title: New: Cheerleader – Do What You Want
body:
All the best songs have a good whistling section; _The Dock of the Bay_ by **Otis Redding**, _Two of Us_ by **The Beatles** and _Pumped Up Kicks_ by **Foster The People**….

wait a second, scratch that last one. **Cheerleader’s** new track _Do What You Want_ has a cutesy 60’s feel to it, sunshine drenched pop all the way, trickling with **Beach Boys** influence. Check out _Do What You Want_ below.

 [Do What You Want](http://soundcloud.com/cheerleadersounds/do-what-you-want) by [CHEERLEADER](http://soundcloud.com/cheerleadersounds)

Cheerleader’s new track Do What You Want has a cutesy 60’s feel to it, sunshine drenched pop \[…\]
